Within your composite there is a TabFolder which has a Group inside it which 
has a Composite with a GridLayout which has another Composite with a 
GridLayout which finally has a Composite with a FillLayout.  For some reason, 
one of the children in the Composite with a FillLayout has a GridData.  You 
can not mix a FillLayout in the parent with GridData in the children.  This is 
a coding error.  Please fix your code - or report the bug against the owner of 
that code.

In 3.1, FillLayout was modified to use caching to improve performance.  For 
the caching, FillData was introduced.  FillData conflicts with GridData.  In 
3.0, FillLayout ignored the layout data field so there was no conflict.
